name: Tic-Tac-Toe with Mario Physics
description:
If tic tac toe had Mario Physics!

This fan game is inspired from the animation by level up.
Check out the original video!!!

It is a 2 player game. So, you can also bring your friend along.
It has simple tic-tac-toe controls, just click the boxes to fill them!

This game is very similar to Level UP's video but not completely same as it's missing some things.

 There's a lot of stuff coming up.
So, stay subscribed to my YouTube channel and also itch.io page :>

This game is MADE WITH GODOT.
